short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Overrides the default new tab page with a minimalistic design of customizable links and background image.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is for those users who have a standard list of sites that they visit often and want an elegant, simple and attractive way to quickly navigate to them. The goal is a hyper minimal design to remove clutter and provide easy setup and instant navigation.

Features:

- Upload your favorite wallpaper/background image
- Add/remove bookmarks to show only the websites you use frequently
- Custom bookmark icons. 3 ways to choose:
    - Scan the website for pre-existing icons
    - Choose from the included icon library
    - Upload your own custom icons

To customize, access the options page via the gear icon in the bottom left corner of the new tab page. Alternatively, click the extension's icon to the right of the URL navbar and click "Options".
